name: Wellms World's First Headless LMS
description: The software architecture of the Wellms as Distributed Monolith

people.name: Student/Client
people.description: A user that interact with courses.

people.name: Tutor/Content Author
people.description: A content creator and e-learnig tutor.

components.name: framework that makes responsive email easy

containers.name: Database
containers.description: persistent database information (for example, users, payments, orders, courses, topics,  other metadata)

containers.name: Image processing optimizers
containers.description: JpegOptim, Optipng, Pngquant 2, SVGO 1, Gifsicle, cwebp

containers.name: API Application
containers.description: Provides All LMS functionality headlessly via a JSON/HTTPS REST API.

relationships.description: use binary tools for image formating, resize and compression
use binary tools for video transcoding, resize and compression

components.name: Settings
components.technology: Settings. Additional global fields of various types and other package setup

components.name: Csv-users
components.technology: CSV-Users. Exporting and importing users in `.csv` format

components.name: Model-fields
components.technology: Model Fields. Extra attributes to any model

components.name: Mailerlite
components.technology: MailerLite. Customized group for LMS events

components.name: Webinar
components.technology: Webinar. Live video stream with `Jitsi` and `YouTube`

components.name: Topic-types
components.technology: Topic Types. List of possible Topic Types for Course content

components.name: Auth
components.technology: Auth. User authentication. Roles & Permission Management

components.name: Payments
components.technology: Payments. Facades that allows to connect payment gateways

components.name: Templates-pdf
components.technology: Templates-PDF. Templates in fabric.js frontend rendering format.

components.name: Images

relationships.description: use binary tools for image formating, resize and compression

components.technology: Images. Responsive and compressions processing module

components.name: Courses-import-export
components.technology: Courses Import Export. ZIP package and duplicate feature.

components.name: Templates-email
components.technology: Templates-Email. Notification management with custom mjml templates.

components.name: Assign-without-account
components.technology: Package enabling accessing courses and products without having account.

components.name: Scorm
components.technology: Scorm. Attach Scorm packages to courses

components.name: Templates-sms
components.technology: Templates-SMS. Notification management with custom templates

components.name: Consultations
components.technology: Consultations. One to one conversation package with `jitsi`

components.name: Vouchers
components.technology: Vouchers. E-commerce vouchers to manage cart promotion

components.name: Files
components.technology: Files. Uploading, deleting and reusing files.

relationships.description: use binary tools for video transcoding, resize and compression

containers.name: Frontend Demo
containers.description: Frontend Demo availabe to be extends into bespoke web app

relationships.description: edits templates and generates PDF previews
edits templates and generates PDF previews

components.name: Logs
components.description: Audit Log. Tracking users API calls.

components.name: Questionnaires
components.description: Management of Questionnaire that can be attached to courses. questions management, answer statistics

components.name: Courses
components.description: Courses management. courses attributes management, program creation - content authoring, import / export, products details, certifications, tags & categories, Questionaries, Statistics, Users/User Group access

components.name: Templates
components.description: Management of various templates in database and assigning them to Events so that content based on these templates is automatically generated and/or sent to users. Supported channels: email,  push, sms, pdf (certificates)

components.name: Roles
components.description: User roles and permissions (in admin panel)

components.name: Consultations
components.description: One to one conversation management. Used to create jitsi meetings

components.name: Notifications
components.description: List of currently logged admin notification (system events) Management of users notification (system events)

components.name: Orders
components.description: List of orders and their details

components.name: User Groups
components.description: User management. Creating of unlimited user groups to assign courses, webinars and other events access

components.name: Reports
components.description: List of LMS reports Courses money spent metric, Courses popularity metric, Courses seconds spent metric, Tutors popularity metric

components.name: Vouchers
components.description: Definition of Coupons that can be applied to User Cart before placing an Order, calculating a discount depending on multiple different, configurable rules.

components.name: Products
components.description: Simple shop management , Product attributes, Pricing with Taxes, Creating single or bulk products, Promotions management, Users/User Group access, Product limitations

components.name: Settings.
components.description: management of application config keys for each package, unlimited creation of bespoke variables (text, boolean, image, json, file) consumed by frontend

components.name: Payments
components.description: List of orders and their details

components.name: H5Ps
components.description: H5P Management. Upload Export Content authoring

components.name: Users
components.description: User management. Students, Tutors, Content Creators and Admins.

sections.title: Context
sections.content:
## Context

Technical documentation is available at [https://docs.wellms.io/](https://docs.wellms.io/)
